Military families are the backbone of America and we can never thank them enough for all that they do. I'll continue to work across the aisle to support our service members and their families.

I also support the Military Widow’s Tax Elimination Act, to provide the spouses of service members who give the ultimate sacrifice in the line of duty with the full benefits and financial assistance to which they’re entitled.

I’ve introduced legislation that would cut the red tape military spouses face as they practice their licensed professions & move their businesses from state-to-state. Military spouses already face enough challenges - being able to continue their careers should not be one of them.

On Military Family Appreciation Month and every month, we honor the sacrifices military families make each day as they support their loved ones serving at home and abroad, in defense of our nation. My bill – the International Climate Accountability Act – would prevent the President from using federal funds to withdraw from the Agreement. If the President won’t believe our scientists & experts to protect the well-being of our people and planet, Congress must act.

Extreme weather, rising temperatures and polluted air are already having a dangerous impact on our health, wildlife and environment – our planet needs a coordinated global response to combat the effects of climate change, today, more than ever before.

The Trump administration has chosen to withdraw the U.S. from the historic Paris Climate Agreement, which will cede U.S. leadership & put the well-being of generations of Americans – & people around the world – at risk from the dangerous effects of climate change. https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1191457545132691462 …

Carlton Farrand and Ralph Noveletsky are American heroes who courageously answered the call of duty during World War II and sacrificed so much. It was a great honor to be able to posthumously honor these men and present their families with the medals they earned. pic.twitter.com/cxo2Ep3U8S

The Drug Free Communities program helps local youth drug prevention coalitions do life-saving work to protect children from substance use. I’m pleased to announce more than $1.2 million in these DFC grants which will help bolster the efforts of our NH prevention partners.

Read more here:  https://www.shaheen.senate.gov/news/press/shaheen-and-hassan-re-introduce-legislation-to-designate-a-unique-zip-code-for-swanzey-nh_ …

The lack of a consistent ZIP code in Swanzey hinders the delivery of mail & risks compromising public safety when first responders need to quickly get to an address. That’s why @SenatorHassan & I re-introduced a bill that would designate a unique zip code for Swanzey.
